definition.name: Codecov ATS
definition.description: GitHub Action that returns selected test labels from Codecov☂️ to CI
definition.author: codecov

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Repository upload token - get it from codecov.io. Required or set it with the environment variable CODECOV_TOKEN

inputs.name: static_token
inputs.description: Repository static token - get it from codecov.io. Required or set it with the environment variable CODECOV_STATIC_TOKEN

inputs.name: enterprise_url
inputs.description: Change the upload host (Enterprise use only)

inputs.name: file_pattern
inputs.description: File pattern to search for. Defaults to "*"

inputs.name: folders_to_exclude
inputs.description: Avoid certain folders when uploading static analysis

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: Force upload of files during static analysis regardless if they are new

inputs.name: label_max_wait_time
inputs.description: Max time (in seconds) to wait for the label analysis. Default is to wait forever.

inputs.name: os
inputs.description: Override the assumed OS. Options are linux | macos | windows.

inputs.name: output_variable
inputs.description: Variable to save down tests string. Defaults to CODECOV_ATS_TESTS

inputs.name: override_base_commit
inputs.description: Override the assumed base commit.

inputs.name: override_branch
inputs.description: Branch to which this commit belongs to

inputs.name: override_commit
inputs.description: Commit SHA (with 40 chars)

inputs.name: override_parent
inputs.description: SHA (with 40 chars) of what should be the parent of this commit

inputs.name: override_pr
inputs.description: Specify the pull request number mannually.

inputs.name: override_slug
inputs.description: owner/repo slug used instead of the private repo token in Self-hosted

inputs.name: static_folders_to_exclude
inputs.description: Folders not to search during static analysis

inputs.name: static_folder_to_search
inputs.description: Folder to search during static analysis

inputs.name: static_force
inputs.description: Force running of static analysis

inputs.name: static_number_processes
inputs.description: Number of processes to use during static analysis

inputs.name: static_search_pattern
inputs.description: File pattern to search for during static analysis

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: Specify whether the Codecov output should be verbose

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Specify which version of the Codecov CLI should be used. Defaults to `latest`
